sentences.en: Beets are Hank's favorite vegetable.
sentences.cn: 甜菜根是汉克最爱吃的蔬菜.

sentences.en: He was a favorite with his schoolmasters but not his schoolmates.
sentences.cn: 学校的老师们很喜欢他，但同学们对他并不待见。

sentences.en: Her favorite essence smells like gardenias.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢的香水闻起来象栀子花.

sentences.en: Her favorite music was by Run DMC, a rap group.
sentences.cn: 她最喜爱的音乐是RunDMC说唱组合的音乐。

sentences.en: His favorite fruits and vegetables as well as 55 lb. of bamboo will be on board for nourishment.
sentences.cn: 除了它最喜爱的水果和蔬菜以外还有55磅的竹子将会作为它在飞机上的食物。

sentences.en: I have picked this article from the book as my favorite.
sentences.cn: 这本书中我最喜欢的是这篇文章.

sentences.en: I was delighted to be able to eat my favorite dishes to my heart's content.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴能够痛痛快快地吃我最喜爱的菜。

sentences.en: It can also be about your pet, favorite food or dresses and so on.
sentences.cn: 它也可以是关于你的宠物，喜爱的食物和衣服等等的小文章。

sentences.en: It is one of my favorite novels.
sentences.cn: 这是我最喜爱的一本小说。

sentences.en: John was laid away in his favorite spot on the hill.
sentences.cn: 约翰被安葬在山上他最喜欢的地方.

sentences.en: Most hoarders have favorite hiding places.
sentences.cn: 多数喜好聚藏东西的人都有自己最喜欢的贮藏处。

sentences.en: My favorite song is on the jukebox.
sentences.cn: 自动点唱机在放我最喜欢的歌。

sentences.en: Pepper is one of my favorite spices.
sentences.cn: 胡椒是我所喜爱的一种调味品.

sentences.en: Spring and autumn are my favorite seasons.
sentences.cn: 春秋是我喜欢的季节.

sentences.en: The college library is a favorite haunt.
sentences.cn: 大学图书馆是人们喜欢的地方.

sentences.en: This anemone is one of my favorite plants.
sentences.cn: 这朵银莲花是我最喜爱的植物之一。

sentences.en: This is one of my favorite things.
sentences.cn: 这是我最喜爱的一样东西。

sentences.en: This is your favorite announcer signing off for tonight.
sentences.cn: 这是你最喜欢的播音员在结束今晚的广播.

sentences.en: We had lunch the other day at our favorite restaurant.
sentences.cn: 前两天我们在最喜欢的餐馆吃了午饭。

sentences.en: You can use this software to burn custom compilations of your favorite tunes.
sentences.cn: 你可以用这个软件来刻录你最喜欢的乐曲。

words.tran_cn: 有利的；良好的；赞成的，赞许的；讨人喜欢的
有利的；受到优待的；受到喜爱的
赞成；宠爱；帮助（favor的过去分词）；给…以恩惠
幸运儿；喜欢的事物；特别喜欢的人

trans.tran_cn: 特别喜爱的人/物，亲信，夺冠热门
